story.text: Jan 3 Nabors Industries Ltd. (NBR.N) said it expects fourth-quarter earnings to be lower than analysts' consensus estimate due to weaker-than-expected results from its operations in Lower 48 U.S. states and Canada. The oil and gas drilling company now expects earnings to be 95 cents to $1 a share. The consensus estimate is $1.11 before exceptional items, according to Reuters Estimates. (Reporting by Madhubanti Routh in Bangalore)
story.title: nabors says q4 profit to miss consensus estimate
